text: <@U7V9DQ31P> Thanks, I will try on it. <@UDHTMSVDH> its an Old German CRM "Harmony" ( <http://www.harmony.de/> ). <@ULSCN5SSW> Thanks, I will have a look at it, so it will like HubSpot to DB connection, right? And use some scripts to take actions in this CRM.
exactly, you can connect from HubSpot API to Harmony's DB (assuming it's most probably  a MySQL or a Postgress you wont have any problem)
Hi guys, is there a way to get HubSpot UTK along with contact info when using get batch contacts by user_tokens endpoint? I need to map the contact info to token to filter data by contact properties

We haven’t documented it yet, but you can use this endpoint `/v1/contact/byUtk/batch` which will return the UTKs. The parameters are the same as the version that is currently documented <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/contacts/get_batch_by_user_token>

Hey Zack, I was able to get the data. However, it is missing most of the properties compared to the documented endpoint. Also wasn’t able to get contact info for UTK’s that are already contacts on HS. Is that expected?
It’s not, I’ll look into that for you. Can you share (via direct message) what you sent in your request and what you got back in this API vs the other one?
